@DynamicsArabia Blog Post: Understanding the Settlement Mechanism in Microsoft Dynamics AX
posts.caption: blog.mohamedaamer.com
posts.description: Settlement is an accounting transaction that occurs on accounts payable, accounts receivables, and general ledger. This transaction is used mainly for settling vendor invoices against vendor payments or advanced payment, and customer invoices against customer collections or advanced collection. Sett...
